caption.title: Yeast strains, oligonucleotides and plasmids used in this work.

tr.td: Amplification of ARS305 from genomic DNA. Fw primer bearing 48 bp of homology with DL1702.
Amplification of ARS305 from genomic DNA. Rev primer bearing 50 bp of homology with DL1666.
Insertion of ARS305 in reverse orientation (compare with primer pair DL3370/DL3371). Rev primer bearing homology with DL1702.
Insertion of ARS305 in reverse orientation (compare with primer pair DL3370/DL3371). Fwd primer bearing homology with DL1666.
Insertion of shortened ARS305, fwd (cf. DL3447). Primes 32 bp downstream B4 element, removing 291 bp of ARS305 “full-length “3’ end.
Insertion of shortened ARS305, rev (cf. DL3446). Primes 34 bp upstream ARS305 ACS, removing 83 bp of ARS305 “full-length “5’ end.
Insertion of linker substitution Lin102 (B4-) in ARS305 by two stages overlapping PCRs. Fw primer, pair with DL3371.
Insertion of linker substitution Lin102 (B4-) in ARS305 by two stages overlapping PCRs. Rev primer, pair with DL3370.
Insertion of linker substitution Lin22 (B1-) in ARS305 by two stages overlapping PCRs. Fw primer, pair with DL3371.
Insertion of linker substitution Lin22 (B1-) in ARS305 by two stages overlapping PCRs. Rev primer, pair with DL3370.
Insertion of linker substitution Lin4 (A-) in ARS305 by two stages overlapping PCRs. Fw primer, pair with DL3371.
Insertion of linker substitution Lin4 (A-) in ARS305 by two stages overlapping PCRs. Rev primer, pair with DL3370.
HSP104 Northern PCR probe, fwd. Primes about 100nt upstream HSP104 ATG in PTE TOFF-HSP104 plasmid serie
HSP104 Northern PCR probe, rev. Primes upstream BamHI site in PTETOFF-HSP104 plasmid serie
ACT1 Northern PCR probe/RT qPCR amplicon, fwd.
ACT1 Northern PCR probe/RT qPCR amplicon, rev.
ARS404 qRT-PCR, amplicon downstream ARS404 ACS. 5’ primes 202 bp after SSB1 STOP, pair with DL3764.
ARS404 qRT-PCR, amplicon downstream ARS404 ACS. 5’ primes 288 bp after SSB1 STOP, pair with DL3763.
ARS404 qRT-PCR, amplicon upstream ARS404 ACS. 5’ primes 23 bp after HO STOP, pair with DL3768.
ARS404 qRT-PCR, amplicon upstream ARS404 ACS. 5’ primes60 bp before HO STOP, pair with DL3767.
ARS1004 qRT-PCR, amplicon upstream ARS1004 ACS. 5’ anneals80 bp after REE1 STOP
ARS1004 qRT-PCR, amplicon upstream ARS1004 ACS. 5’ anneals170 bp after REE1 STOP
ARS1004 qRT-PCR, amplicon downstream ARS1004 ACS. 5’ anneals 228 bp after REE1 STOP
ARS1004 qRT-PCR, amplicon downstream ARS1004 ACS. 5’ anneals 318 bp after REE1 STOP
Cloning of HSP104 in pCM188, fwd.
Cloning of HSP104 in pCM188, rev.
Cloning of HSP104 3' UTR in pCM188-HSP104, fwd.
Cloning of HSP104 3' UTR in pCM188-HSP104, fwd.

ARS1 KO in pDL214 by overlapping PCRs, Fwd. Anneals 236 bp after pDL214’s URA3 STOP. To be used for both 1 st and 2nd step of the reaction. During 1 st step, use it in combination with DL4027. During 2nd step, use it in combination with DL4030.
ARS1 KO in pDL214 by overlapping PCRs, Rev. Anneals 334 bp after pDL214’s URA3 STOP. To be used during 1 st step in combination with DL4026.
ARS1 KO in pDL214 by overlapping PCRs, Fwd. Anneals 746 bp after pDL214’s URA3 STOP. To be used during 1 st step in combination with DL4030.

ARS1 KO in pDL214 by overlapping PCRs, Rev. Anneals 843 bp after pDL214’s URA3 STOP. To be used for both 1 st and 2nd step of the reaction. During 1 st step, use it in combination with DL4029. During 2nd step, use it in combination with DL4026.
ARS1 KO in pDL214 by overlapping PCRs, Rev sequencing primer. Anneals 1157 bp after pDL214’s URA3 STOP.

Reverse ARS1206 orientation in pDL214, Fwd. Bears 55 bp of homology with ARS1206 3’ end (+320 to+375 after HSP104 STOP) followed by 25 bp of homology to 5’ of T-rich predicted ACS (+102 to+127 after HSP104 STOP). Pair with DL4001.

Reverse ARS1206 orientation in pDL214, Rev. Bears 55 bp of homology with ARS1206 5’ end (+51 to+106 after HSP104 STOP) followed by 25 bp of homology with 3’ end of ARS1206 (+295 to+320 after HSP104 STOP). Pair with DL4000.
Reverse ARS1206 orientation in pDL214, extension of homology region downstream ARS1206, Fwd. Primes 134 bp upstream CYC1 terminator. Pair with M13 reverse (DL2163).
Reverse ARS1206 orientation in pDL214, extension of homology region downstream ARS1206, Rev.
Reverse ARS1206 orientation in pDL214, extension of homology region upstream ARS1206, Rev. Primes 106 bp downstream HSP104 STOP. Pair with DL530.
Reverse ARS1206 orientation in pDL214, extension of homology region upstream ARS1206, Fwd. Anneals 2409–2429 in HSP104.
Reverse ARS1206 orientation in pDL214, Fwd sequencing primer annealing 108 bp before HSP104 STOP.
RNase H cleavage assay. HSP104, antisense, position 2606–2583 from HSP104 ATG.
RNase H cleavage assay. HSP104 Northern oligonucleotide probe, antisense, position 2718–2631 from HSP104 ATG.
RNase H cleavage assay. Poly(dT) oligonucleotide
RNase H cleavage assay, testHSP104 readthrough on pDL905, antisense, position 2923–2895 fromHSP104 ATG
RNase H cleavage assay, test HSP104 readthrough on pDL907, antisense, position 2909–2879 from HSP104 ATG
Colin et al. Colin et al., 2014
